### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO): DNA Sequencing Services for Fisheries and Oceans Canada
#### Tender Reference # 30002917
#### Date of Publication: 12 December 2022
#### Closing Date: 10 January 2023, 13:00 EST

**Background and Objective**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) is seeking a contractor to provide DNA sequencing services in support of science activities. The contractor will be responsible for sequencing biological and environmental samples using Sanger sequencing and high-throughput sequencing (HTS) technologies. The services will be required on an on-demand basis.

**Scope of Work**
The contractor must perform sequencing on Illumina MiSeq and NovaSeq systems, as well as Pacific Biosciences Seqel systems. The final product must be delivered according to a mutually agreed-upon timeline in a compatible electronic format.

**Security Classification**
This procurement does not have any security requirements.

**Trade Agreements**
This procurement is subject to the Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), the Canada - Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other applicable trade agreements.

**Location and Delivery**
The contract is for delivery across Canada, with the exception of locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

**Contact Information**
For any questions or requests for information, please contact:
Cal LaKing
Fisheries and Oceans Canada
Phone: 506-478-3581
Email: [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca)

**Notice and Attachments**
The full notice and attachments can be found on the Canada Buys website: [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca). 

Please review the complete notice for more detailed information regarding the procurement process and application requirements.
